summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 HONDA ACCORD CROSS TOUR. WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 70 MPH, THE CONTACT EXPERIENCED SEVERE VIBRATION IN THE STEERING WHEEL, INCLUDING THE FRONT DRIVER AND PASSENGER SEATS. IN ADDITION, THE BRAKE PEDAL WOULD PULSATE UPON ENGAGING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER WHO STATED THE VIBRATION WAS A CHARACTERISTIC OF THE VEHICLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE PROBLEM. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 9,153.  UPDATED 01/13/12*LJ
